definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Finally, a new separation hyperplane is generated by the optimization training.
sentences.chinese: 最后，通过优化训练，产生一个新的分离超平面。

sentences.english: In this paper, the reducibility of affine hyperplane arrangements is discussed by using the matrix method.
sentences.chinese: 本文用矩阵方法讨论仿射超平面构形的可约性。

sentences.english: The main topic of this thesis is about central hyperplane arrangements with modular elements in their intersection lattice.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要讨论了超平面构形的模元素及其应用。

sentences.english: The reducibility of affine hyperplane arrangements is discussed by using the matrix method.
sentences.chinese: 用矩阵方法讨论仿射超平面构形的可约性。

sentences.english: Distribution of first fitting points on hyperplane is derived in the diffusion process.
sentences.chinese: 求出了一类扩散过程关于超平面的首中点分布。

sentences.english: Ultra flat and true Blades Uniform bevel edge using the "Agilis Edge" technology. Full width-constant contact of the Blade to drum.
sentences.chinese: 超平面和精确的叶片斜边统一使用“敏锐边缘”技术。

sentences.english: The separating hyperplane of traditional support vector machines is sensitive to noises and outliers.
sentences.chinese: 传统的支持向量机分类超平面对噪声和野值非常敏感。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
